abstract: DealBook Online; UBM announces it is in discussion with several entities to consider selling PR Newswire.
lead_paragraph: The British marketing company and organizer of trade shows said it was meeting with several parties to potentially sell the business.

headline.main: UBM in ‘Highly Preliminary’ Talks to Sell PR Newswire

snippet: The British marketing company and organizer of trade shows said it was meeting with several parties to potentially sell the business.
